extendedInfo.description: Screenshot FREE is free permanently! PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU ANDROID DEVICE IS ROOTED. WE DO NOT SUPPORT UNROOT DEVICES NOW. If you have any question about this app, please feel free to submit a feedback instead of leaving a 1 star comment. We will TRY OUR BEST TO FIX IT.It's a faster and smaller screenshot app and just take less than 0.1% of your phone memory.If you want to use this app on your Android devices, please make sure your phone is ROOTed. What is root: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rooting_(Android_OS)Android 4.0 supporting version is coming soon! If you use Galaxy Nexus, HTC One X or other Ice Cream Sandwich (ICS) phone, DO NOT download it now.Features:- Take screen shot whenever you want by clicking the floating camera button;- Screenshots you take are saved in your SD card (\SD\ScreenshotFREE\);- Share screenshots via email, Facebook, twitter, SMS and so on;- More cool features coming soon: picture viewer; image editor and so on;- Feel free to give us your opinion about this app. Will try our best to make Screenshot FREE better!- It's compatible with: Samsung Galaxy series, HTC Desire, HTC Evo, LG Optimus, Motorola Droid, Milestone, Huawei etc.KW: screenshot,screen shot,screenshot ux,photo,pics,picture,snapshot,root,rooting,rooted

reviews.title: This good but ...
reviews.comment: Please add more way to catch the screen. The floating camera is annoying.  Fix this and i will add one star
reviews.author: fadlih hasanuddin

reviews.title: I can keep logs with this
reviews.comment: This app hasn\'t noticeably affected the performance of my deice, and now I can keep track of benchmark results, program output, etc. It makes documentation much easier and doesn\'t add bloatware.  Thank you very much for this little gem
reviews.author: Eduardo Alejandro del Corral Lira

reviews.title: Ashlee
reviews.comment: The best screen shot app ever!!!!!! :D But it was very hard to \342\200\230Root\342\200\230 my phone :) but overall it is an awesome app! :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple & easy
reviews.comment: Thank you. Luv this app esp with the icon which alwiz there when to use. Appreciate if u cld update with it\'s own folder for easy seach. Thumb up!
reviews.author: Euss Rashiq

reviews.title: Very Good app
reviews.comment: This app is very good but it needs to be able to set the folder for the Screen shot\'s and the camera still stays in the screen shot other then that this app is just right
reviews.author: James Haywood

reviews.title: Distorted
reviews.comment: Screen shot of non moving screen ends up red and white and distorted like cable TV with bad reception. On evo lte.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Work fine but with less functions
reviews.comment: Worked with my rooted Karbonn A9. But had to Uninstalled it as got some new app with more functions to choose from with less screenshot\'s file size.
reviews.author: Ankur Oraon

reviews.title: a good app for u rooted guys
reviews.comment: its a good app it better than having to push all those buttons cuz that really urks my nerves and to screen be cutting off if i dont press the buttons right
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on rooted Droid X2
reviews.comment: The app runs and claims it\'s saved the screenshot, but the folder is empty. The other problem I have with the app is that it doesn\'t show up in the app list, I have to go to the play store to run it and finally to uninstall it.
reviews.author: Keith Greenawalt

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: best free screenshot app I\'ve ever seen
reviews.author: David Stapp

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: Works perfectly on my xperia x8. But my suggestions is to add ability to hide the camera shortcut when capture, so it wont be shown on captured image file. And maybe improve the Captured Image Quality, because it looks little blurry. Thx.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: So far so good!  Evo 4G
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: They are liars
reviews.comment: The phone must be rooted they say it doesn\'t but it does
reviews.author: Joanna Robinson

reviews.title: Sorry
reviews.comment: Didn\'t want This app
reviews.author: Anirudh Srivastav

reviews.title: doesnt work
reviews.comment: picture distorted its all red...!!!??
reviews.author: Miya Kakihara

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: I was excited to download this because of its small size. After taking several screenshots and having to use file explorer to find them they all show up as a garbled mess blue lines.  Horrible horrible
reviews.author: Eric Denoun

reviews.title: Works like a charm
reviews.comment: Easy to use, does what\'s its told.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: Best working + fully functional for free??? 5 Star rated APP :3 Works on lgl45c CWM Engdroid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Robert L
reviews.comment: This app works fine. However It doesn\'t save the screenshot in the gallery. You need to open the screen that shows all apps then open \"My Files\" they\'ll be saved in a folder there
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No
reviews.comment: Red colors. Uninstalled. Why is screenshot capture so difficult?
reviews.author: A Google User
